title: Life Science HiSET.S.3.2 (Q20)
prompt: How does Joe’s situation relate to the idea that eliminating dairy products will result in a decrease in cholesterol?
description: Joe has his cholesterol checked by his doctor and was told it was close to 300.  He began a strict diet which eliminated all dairy products. Three months later he visited the doctor and his cholesterol dropped to 240.
feedback: Joe's situation is supportive of the idea that eliminating dairy products will lead to a decrease in cholesterol.  However, one example does not prove an idea; more data is needed to show that a hypothesis is true or even well-supported. The correct answer is "It supports the idea that eliminating dairy products will lead to a decrease in cholesterol, but doesn’t prove it."
